description: A man humorously runs around his bed to catch up on sleep.
title: Sleepy Marathon
n_1: The man tossed and turned, unable to sleep.
n_2: He got an odd idea after looking at his clock.
c1_2: Maybe I should run around to catch up?
n_3: He started jogging around the bed.
n_4: Exhausted, he finally fell asleep quickly after.
